mapper.insert: insert into sleep_tab(s_board_num, haknum, s_name,s_major, s_subject, s_sleep_type, s_content, s_start_date, s_end_date, s_board_date) values(sleep_board_seq.nextval, #{s_haknum}, #{s_name}, #{s_major}, #{s_subject}, #{s_sleep_type}, #{s_content}, #{s_start_date}, #{s_end_date}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, s_board_num, haknum, s_name, s_major, s_subject, s_sleep_type, s_content, s_start_date, s_end_date, s_board_date, s_confirm, s_confirm_date, s_cancel from (select * from sleep_tab order by s_board_num desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
